alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Logan, southwestern Johnson, northeastern Scott and northwestern Yell Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Booneville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Booneville... Paris... Magazine... Subiaco... Hartman... Scranton... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Hinkle... Hoyt... Mount Magazine... Midway in Logan County... Tokalon... Spadra... Lake Dardanelle... Havana... Morrison Bluff... Dublin... Ludwig... This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
